descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: RJ Barrett spins by his defenders, kicks out to Derrick Rose for a 3-pointer and Spike Lee shows his appreciation.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Spike Lee loves every bit of this Knicks play) 2021/05/30 ESHEET

videos.headline: Spike Lee loves every bit of this Knicks play

videos.description: Trae Young sends a pass around Taj Gibson and right to Clint Capela for a floater.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Trae Young's wraparound pass find Capela for floater) 2021/05/30 ESHEET

videos.headline: Trae Young's wraparound pass find Capela for floater

videos.description: Danilo Gallinari Eurosteps around a defender and drops in a floater while drawing contact.
videos.headline: Gallinari Eurosteps for and-1

videos.description: The Hawks connect on 3-pointers on three straight possessions causing the Atlanta crowd to erupt in excitement.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Hawks' three straight 3-pointers sends Atlanta into a frenzy) 2021/05/30 ESHEET

videos.headline: Hawks' three straight 3-pointers sends Atlanta into a frenzy

videos.description: Trae Young dribbles downcourt, draws a foul and still manages to drop in a leaning floater.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Trae is too smooth with this and-1) 2021/05/30 ESHEET

videos.headline: Trae is too smooth with this and-1

videos.description: Being heavily guarded by Julius Randle, John Collins still manages to hit the jumper as the shot clock expires.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Collins beats the shot clock with tough jumper) 2021/05/30 ESHEET

videos.headline: Collins beats the shot clock with tough jumper

videos.description: Derrick Rose passes ahead to RJ Barrett, who gets to the rim for an and-1.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Barrett breaks away for the and-1) 2021/05/30 ESHEET

videos.headline: Barrett breaks away for the and-1

videos.description: Kevin Huerter and Danilo Gallinari widen the Hawks' lead, and Chris Tucker dances along with the fans.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Chris Tucker, Hawks fans enjoying life as their team's lead widens) 2021/05/30 ESHEET

videos.headline: Chris Tucker, Hawks fans enjoying life as their team's lead widens

videos.description: Reggie Bullock tries to go after the Hawks' bench after getting elbowed by Danilo Gallinari. Julius Randle responds by committing a flagrant 1 on Gallinari.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Tensions rise late between Knicks and Hawks) 2021/05/30 ESHEET

videos.headline: Tensions rise late between Knicks and Hawks
